languages.text: "Это... безумие для корабля, один офицерский состав которого исчисляется в сотнях. Только рабочая сила, которая потребуется для такой проверки..."
"This is... madness for a ship whose officer corps alone comprises hundreds of people. The work hours that would be required for such an audit..."
languages.original_text: "Это... безумие для корабля, один офицерский состав которого исчисляется в сотнях. Только рабочая сила, которая потребуется для такой проверки..."

traits.locale_text: "This is... madness for a ship whose officer corps alone comprises thousands of people. The work hours that would be required for such an audit..."
"This is... madness for a ship whose officer corps alone comprises thousands of people. The work hours that would be required for such an audit..."
"This is... madness for a ship whose officer corps alone comprises thousands of people. The work hours that would be required for such an audit..."
"This is... madness for a ship whose officer corps alone comprises hundreds of people. The work hours that would be required for such an audit..."
"This is... madness for a ship whose officer corps alone comprises hundreds of people. The work hours that would be required for such an audit..."

languages.text: 「そんなことは…正気の沙汰ではありません。この船には士官だけでも何百人もいるんです。そのような監査を行うには一体どれだけの時間が必要になるか…」
languages.original_text: "This is... madness for a ship whose officer corps alone comprises hundreds of people. The work hours that would be required for such an audit..."

traits.locale_text: 「そんなことは…正気の沙汰ではありません。この船には士官だけでも何百人もいるんです。そのような監査を行うには一体どれだけの時間が必要になるか…」

languages.text: "Sadece subay kadrosu bile yüzlerce kişiden oluşan bir gemi için böyle bir şey yapmak çılgınlık. Bu işe harcanacak saatler..."
languages.original_text: "This is... madness for a ship whose officer corps alone comprises hundreds of people. The work hours that would be required for such an audit..."

traits.locale_text: "Sadece subay kadrosu bile yüzlerce kişiden oluşan bir gemi için böyle bir şey yapmak çılgınlık. Bu iş için harcanacak saatler..."

languages.text: «Eso sería... una locura en una nave cuyo cuerpo de oficiales ya se mide por centenas... Las horas de trabajo que llevaría semejante auditoría...».
languages.original_text: "This is... madness for a ship whose officer corps alone comprises hundreds of people. The work hours that would be required for such an audit..."

traits.locale_text: «Eso sería... una locura en una nave cuyo cuerpo de oficiales ya se mide por centenas... Las horas de trabajo que llevaría semejante auditoría...».

languages.text: “这……这简直是疯了，这艘船光是军官就有成百上千人之多。如果对所有人进行审查，需要的时间简直无法想象……”
languages.original_text: "This is... madness for a ship whose officer corps alone comprises hundreds of people. The work hours that would be required for such an audit..."

traits.locale_text: “这……这简直是疯了，这艘船光是军官就有成百上千人之多。如果对所有人进行审查，需要的时间简直无法想象……”

languages.text: « Ce serait de la folie, étant donné que le corps d'officiers de ce vaisseau comporte à lui seul des centaines de personnes. Le nombre d'heures que réclamerait un tel audit... »
languages.original_text: "This is... madness for a ship whose officer corps alone comprises hundreds of people. The work hours that would be required for such an audit..."

traits.locale_text: « Ce serait de la folie, étant donné que le corps d'officiers de ce vaisseau comporte à lui seul des centaines de personnes. Le nombre d'heures que réclamerait un tel audit... »

languages.text: "Das ist ... Wahnsinn für ein Schiff, dessen Offizierskorps allein Hunderte von Personen umfasst. Die für eine derartige Anhörung anfallenden Arbeitsstunden ..."
languages.original_text: "This is... madness for a ship whose officer corps alone comprises hundreds of people. The work hours that would be required for such an audit..."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist ... Wahnsinn für ein Schiff, dessen Offizierskorps allein Hunderte von Personen umfasst. Die für eine derartige Anhörung anfallenden Arbeitsstunden ..."
